original: @173a * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs gzhan gyis mi thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @173a * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs gzhan gyis mi thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Avalokite≈õvara, invincible.

original: padma r'a ga byi ru mi ltar kun nas rab 'bar 'od 'phro'i sku //
analyzed: padma r'a ga byi ru mi ltar kun nas rab 'bar 'od 'phro'i sku //
translated: Your body, blazing and radiant like a ruby or a lotus,

original: padmo nyi zla bgegs rnams mgo mnan mi bzad rngam pa'i sku chen po //
analyzed: padmo nyi zla bgegs rnams mgo mnan mi bzad rngam pa'i sku chen po //
translated: trampling on the sun, moon, and obstacles with a terrifying, wrathful, great body,

original: zhal gsum phyag drug spyan stong mnga' ba'i rgyal ba dpa' bo 'jigs shing rab 'jigs bzhad pa po //
analyzed: zhal gsum phyag drug spyan stong mnga' ba'i rgyal ba dpa' bo 'jigs shing rab 'jigs bzhad pa po //
translated: the hero of the victors with three faces, six arms, and a thousand eyes, laughing fearfully and terribly,

original: g-yas dkar g-yon sngo dbus dmar dmar ba'i zhal ldan de bzhin ral gri mchog dang dgra sta dang // sdigs mdzub dang ni dril bu zhags bcas tshangs pa'i mgo bsnams stag gi pags pas smad g-yogs pa //
analyzed: g-yas dkar g-yon sngo dbus dmar dmar ba'i zhal ldan de bzhin ral gri mchog dang dgra sta dang // sdigs mdzub dang ni dril bu zhags bcas tshangs pa'i mgo bsnams stag gi pags pas smad g-yogs pa //
translated: with a white right face, a blue left face, and a red central face, holding a supreme sword, an axe, a threatening forefinger, and a bell and noose, holding the head of BrahmƒÅ, and wearing a tiger-skin skirt,

original: bskal pa'i me ltar ye shes 'bar ba'i rlabs 'khrugs rab tu 'jigs pa'i 'ur sgra can //
analyzed: bskal pa'i me ltar ye shes 'bar ba'i rlabs 'khrugs rab tu 'jigs pa'i 'ur sgra can //
translated: with the waves of the blazing wisdom fire of the eon, terrifying with its roaring sound,

original: khrag gis zhal bkang nga ro mi bzad sgra sgrogs sprul gdug khros pas sku rab brgyan //
analyzed: khrag gis zhal bkang nga ro mi bzad sgra sgrogs sprul gdug khros pas sku rab brgyan //
translated: your face filled with blood, roaring unbearably, adorned with angry poisonous snakes.

original: dbang bdag brgyad cu'i mgo bo rlon pas do shal phreng thogs brdabs pa'i gad rgyangs 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: dbang bdag brgyad cu'i mgo bo rlon pas do shal phreng thogs brdabs pa'i gad rgyangs 'byin pa'o //
translated: He wears a garland of eighty fresh heads and a necklace of dry heads.

original: lha 'di dpa' bo dpa' chen po //
analyzed: lha 'di dpa' bo dpa' chen po //
translated: This god is a hero, a great hero,

original: bdud kyi dgra las rnam rgyal zhing //
analyzed: bdud kyi dgra las rnam rgyal zhing //
translated: victorious over the enemy, Mara,

original: gzhan gyis mi thub mthu bo che //
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub mthu bo che //
translated: unconquerable, of great power,

original: pha rol dpung rnams 'joms pa yin //üîΩsngags pa gang zhig nad dang dgra //
analyzed: pha rol dpung rnams 'joms pa yin // sngags pa gang zhig nad dang dgra //
translated: the one who conquers the armies of others.üîΩWhatever the mantra practitioner's illness or enemy,

original: sngon bsags bsod nams ma yin dang // sna tshogs mya ngan 'jigs rnams las //
analyzed: sngon bsags bsod nams ma yin dang // sna tshogs mya ngan 'jigs rnams las //
translated: whatever the various sorrows and fears,

original: sgrol ba mi pham sbyor ba 'di //
analyzed: sgrol ba mi pham sbyor ba 'di //
translated: this application of the invincible oneüîΩliberates from all of them.

original: rnal 'byor brtson par byed pa des //
analyzed: rnal 'byor brtson par byed pa des //
translated: The one who practices yogaüîΩwill, after six months,

original: zla ba drug ni lon pa dang // stag dang seng ge glang chen dang // mkha' lding nor bu sgron mthong 'gyur //
analyzed: zla ba drug ni lon pa dang // stag dang seng ge glang chen dang // mkha' lding nor bu sgron mthong 'gyur //
translated: see a tiger, lion, elephant, garuda, jewel, or lamp.

original: de tshe snying dkyil pad dmar gyi //
analyzed: de tshe snying dkyil pad dmar gyi //
translated: At that time, in the center of the heart,

original: 'dab drug yi ge drug dgod bya //
analyzed: 'dab drug yi ge drug dgod bya //
translated: on a red lotus with six petals, arrange the six syllables.

original: aom a'a:hr'i:h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'a:hr'i:h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Om a hr im hr im hr im phat svaha.

original: de yis de dbus snying po yi //
analyzed: de yis de dbus snying po yi //
translated: In the center of that, in the essence,

original: snying po sa bon hr'i: 'phros pa'o //
analyzed: snying po sa bon hr'i: 'phros pa'o //
translated: the essence seed hr im radiates.

original: sngags 'di 'khor lo bskor ba yi //
analyzed: sngags 'di 'khor lo bskor ba yi //
translated: One should recite this mantra for seven days

original: tshul gyis zhag bdun bzlas nas ni //
analyzed: tshul gyis zhag bdun bzlas nas ni //
translated: in the manner of turning a wheel.

original: gang gang bzlog pa de bsgrub pas //
analyzed: gang gang bzlog pa de bsgrub pas //
translated: Whatever is averted is accomplished

original: las de la ni sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: las de la ni sbyar bar bya //
translated: by applying that rite.

original: las gang yang dag grub 'grub pa //
analyzed: las gang yang dag grub 'grub pa //
translated: Whatever rite is accomplished

original: de nyid skye bo @173b gzhan la yang //
analyzed: de nyid skye bo @173b gzhan la yang //
translated: is also for other people.

original: sngags dang ting 'dzin phyag rgya dang // khrus kyi cho ga sbyin pa yi //
analyzed: sngags dang ting 'dzin phyag rgya dang // khrus kyi cho ga sbyin pa yi //
translated: By the rite of bathing with mantra, concentration, and mudrƒÅ,üîΩit is explained that all will be brought under one‚Äôs power

original: glo bur ring por mi thogs par //üîΩma lus dbang du 'gyur bar bshad //
analyzed: glo bur ring por mi thogs par // ma lus dbang du 'gyur bar bshad //
translated: without delay, suddenly, and completely.

original: gzhan las rnam par rgyal ba'i gdams ngag rdzogs so//
analyzed: gzhan las rnam par rgyal ba'i gdams ngag rdzogs so//
translated: The Instruction on Victory over Others is complete.
